code:
%% OGC NewFinity — Standardized 6-Phase Roadmap Diagram
%% This is the official roadmap diagram used across all documentation

gantt
    title OGC NewFinity — Standardized 6-Phase Roadmap
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    section Phase 1 - Genesis Deployment
    OGCFinity Genesis Token (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)           :done, phase1a, 2024-01-01, 2024-06-30
    Wallet Integration + Tokenomics Finalization      :done, phase1b, 2024-01-01, 2024-06-30
    Contribution Mining Pool Activated               :done, phase1c, 2024-01-01, 2024-06-30
    section Phase 2 - Core Platform
    AI Agent Amy (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)                     :active, phase2a, 2024-07-01, 2025-06-30
    Dashboards + Submission Portal                   :active, phase2b, 2024-07-01, 2025-06-30
    Token-Gated Utilities (HealthTech_PatientRecords)                :active, phase2c, 2024-07-01, 2025-06-30
    section Phase 3 - Challenge Program Activation
    Launch OGC NewFinity Challenge Program          :phase3a, 2025-07-01, 2025-12-31
    Three Official Tracks                            :phase3b, 2025-07-01, 2025-12-31
    First Grants + Public Transparency Reporting    :phase3c, 2025-07-01, 2025-12-31
    section Phase 4 - Platform Expansion
    Developer SDKs                                  :phase4a, 2026-01-01, 2026-06-30
    Marketplace (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)           :phase4b, 2026-01-01, 2026-06-30
    OGC Vault (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)          :phase4c, 2026-01-01, 2026-06-30
    section Phase 5 - Governance Layer
    DAO Governance                                  :phase5a, 2026-07-01, 2027-06-30
    Token Voting                                   :phase5b, 2026-07-01, 2027-06-30
    Treasury Oversight                             :phase5c, 2026-07-01, 2027-06-30
    section Phase 6 - OGC Chain (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
    Native Blockchain (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)                  :phase6a, 2027-07-01, 2028-12-31
    OGCFinity Native Token (HealthTech_PatientRecords)      :phase6b, 2027-07-01, 2028-12-31
    Secure Optional 1:1 Migration Bridge           :phase6c, 2027-07-01, 2028-12-31
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 HealthTech_PatientRecords 和 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'HealthTech_PatientRecords 和 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 的分支。
